tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE alert_customization (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_type VARCHAR(100),
    threshold DECIMAL(10,2),
    email_recipients TEXT,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE alert_history (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  alert_id INT,
  alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  alert_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (alert_id) REFERENCES budget_alerts(alert_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BudgetAlerts (
   alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   alert_name VARCHAR(100),
   description TEXT,
   threshold_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
   created_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE FinancialMilestones (
   milestone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   milestone_name VARCHAR(100),
   due_date DATE,
   completed BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE AlertSubscribers (
   subscriber_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   subscriber_name VARCHAR(100),
   email VARCHAR(150),
   notification_type VARCHAR(50),
   is_active BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE AlertHistory (
   history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   alert_id INT,
   subscriber_id INT,
   alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE BudgetAlerts (
    alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id UUID,
    alert_name VARCHAR(100),
    threshold_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    alert_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE MilestoneAlerts (
    alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id UUID,
    alert_name VARCHAR(100),
    milestone_date DATE,
    milestone_type VARCHAR(50)
);
